mapper.insert: insert into board_tb values (0, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, now(), null);
mapper.select: select bt.board_id, bt.title, bt.content, bt.user_id, ut.username, bt.create_dt, bt.update_dt from board_tb bt join user_tb ut on (bt.user_id = ut.user_id) order by bt.create_dt desc;
select bt.board_id, bt.title, bt.content, bt.user_id, ut.username, bt.create_dt, bt.update_dt from board_tb bt join user_tb ut on (bt.user_id = ut.user_id) where bt.board_id = #{boardId};

select bt.board_id, bt.title, bt.content, bt.user_id, ut.username, bt.create_dt, bt.update_dt from board_tb bt join user_tb ut on (bt.user_id = ut.user_id) where bt.title like "%#{keyword}%" or bt.content like "%#{keyword}%" order by bt.create_dt desc;

select bt.board_id, bt.title, bt.content, bt.user_id, ut.username, bt.create_dt, bt.update_dt from board_tb bt join user_tb ut on (bt.user_id = ut.user_id) where bt.user_id = #{userId} order by bt.create_dt desc;
mapper.update: update board_tb set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_dt = now() where board_id = #{boardId};
